name: Mushroom Pancakes
storyline: Oh, no! Aliens have abducted every razor in The Mushroom Kingdom! Without them, every man would grow a beard, whether he wanted to or not! It's now up to Luigi, the greatest hero who ever lived, to stop them! Take control of Luigi's long lost brother, Mario, as he completely ignores the kingdom's plight and embarks on an epic journey to find ink for his pen!
summary: The last fan game created by supertoad2k. You play as Mario/Beardman as he goes on a quest to collect the 3 missing handle pieces of Star 'Buck' Sampson in order to get more red ink for Mario's pen.
